attributes.action: stop promoting the myth of the existance of god.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Will Gordon Brown take action in acknowledging there is no evidence for the existance of god. Otherwise, will he act to make public the proof he knows of.
We call for the government to cease wasting public money to support those who promote the myth of the existence of god. Not only is it wasteful but promotes social, cultural friction and segregation.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
